## utils.svgMath.screenToWsCoordinates() function

Converts screen coordinates to workspace coordinates.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function screenToWsCoordinates(ws: WorkspaceSvg, screenCoordinates: Coordinate): Coordinate;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  ws | [WorkspaceSvg](./blockly.workspacesvg.md) | The workspace to find the coordinates on. |
|  screenCoordinates | [Coordinate](./blockly.utils.coordinate.md) | The screen coordinates to be converted to workspace coordinates |

**Returns:**

[Coordinate](./blockly.utils.coordinate.md)

The workspace coordinates.
